description: Token registry AA. It links asset IDs to their symbols displayed in dapps such as ODEX.

field_descriptions.symbol: Symbol that identifies an asset, such as AAPL (up to 40 characters but usually short)
field_descriptions.description: Description of an asset (up to 140 characters).
field_descriptions.decimals: How many decimals to use in display units (e.g. GBYTE uses 9).
field_descriptions.drawer: ID of the drawer: 0, 1, 7, 30, 90, 180, 360. Funds from drawer 0 can be withdrawn any time, withdrawal from other drawers requires a waiting period (in days) equal to the ID of the drawer.
field_descriptions.withdraw: Command to withdraw funds. Set the value to 1.
field_descriptions.amount: The amount you want to withdraw.
field_descriptions.move: Command to move funds from a warmed-up drawer to 0-drawer. Set the value to 1.
field_descriptions.address: The address whose balance is to be moved from a warmed-up drawer to drawer 0.
